Key Match Events: Christian Bethancourt drove in seven runs, including a go-ahead two-run single in the ninth
P. Hodge won the game with a 2.0 IP, 1 H, 0 ER, 3 K, 1 BB performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the third game in a three-game series between the Cubs and Pirates, with the Cubs sweeping the series
Others: The game was played at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, with an attendance of 12,660
